content.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Created custom bots for Telegram and Discord, enhancing user engagement through personalized functionalities.
Developed web scrapers, including projects with Web3 integration, to extract and process data efficiently from various online sources.
Built dynamic websites using Django and React.js, delivering robust, scalable, and responsive web applications tailored to client needs.

projects.title: Lumea
projects.description: A web application designed to help users generate personalized study plans using AI.

projects.title: ChefBooklet
projects.description: A web application designed to help users discover recipes based on the ingredients they have on hand.

projects.title: Personal website
projects.description: Responsive website built with NextJS. Components are auto-generated for easy maintenance using config-based data management.

projects.title: HarmonyBot
projects.description: A Telegram bot that helps to download music from streaming services.
